properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) resultCount FROM EVENT_RAFFLE WHERE RAFFLE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.RAFFLE_NO , EVENT_NO , R.RAFFLE_TITLE , R.RAFFLE_CONTENT , R.RAFFLE_DATE , R.RAFFLE_COUNT , R.RAFFLE_STATUS , R.ADMIN_ID , E.EVENT_TYPE FROM EVENT_RAFFLE R JOIN EVENT E USING(EVENT_NO) WHERE RAFFLE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RAFFLE_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
